resources.name: Spartan
resources.title: Spartan
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Built on Anvil’s robust Atlas Platform, the same chassis used for their devastating Ballista air defense system, the Spartan takes armored personal transport to the next level. A fully armored hold outfitted with eight comfortable jump seats is the perfect way to get your squad onto any battlefield. The Spartan’s low profile keeps it safe from anti-aircraft weaponry, and a remote gatling turret helps clear the area for easier deployment.

*Warbond version ships CANNOT be purchased with store credit*
resources.label: Spartan

resources.name: Ares Inferno
resources.title: Ares Inferno
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Anchored by the SF7B Ballistic Gatling, the Ares Inferno packs a ferocious punch, capable of shredding capital class vessels from impressive range. A true lone wolf, the Inferno excels at taking down larger targets solo, thanks to its ability to pound adversaries with sustained fire.

*Warbond version ships CANNOT be purchased with store credit*
resources.label: Ares Inferno

resources.name: Ares Ion
resources.title: Ares Ion
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Spark fear in the corridors of the most formidable gunships and frigates with the Ares Ion. This laser-equipped variant delivers extremely powerful shots to quickly disable the shields of even the biggest enemy vessels.

*Warbond version ships CANNOT be purchased with store credit*
resources.label: Ares Ion

resources.name: Ares Ion
resources.title: Ares Ion
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Spark fear in the corridors of the most formidable gunships and frigates with the Ares Ion. This laser-equipped variant delivers extremely powerful shots to quickly disable the shields of even the biggest enemy vessels.
resources.label: Ares Ion

resources.name: Ares Inferno
resources.title: Ares Inferno
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Anchored by the SF7B Ballistic Gatling, the Ares Inferno packs a ferocious punch, capable of shredding capital class vessels from impressive range. A true lone wolf, the Inferno excels at taking down larger targets solo, thanks to its ability to pound adversaries with sustained fire.
resources.label: Ares Inferno

resources.name: Odyssey
resources.title: Odyssey
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships. This item is being offered as a limited vehicle concept pledge. This means that the vehicle is currently in development and is not yet accessible as playable content in Star Citizen. If you pledge for this vehicle you will be provided with a loaner vehicle for in-game use until it will be made available in a later patch. The loaner vehicle will be a currently playable vehicle of similar approximate size and/or function to the concept vehicle.
resources.excerpt:
Survey distant frontiers and explore the furthest reaches of space with the MISC Odyssey, the most advanced and complete exploration ship available to civilians. Designed to be supremely self-sufficient, the Odyssey comes with an on-board refinery with built-in mining tech, expansive capacity for supplies, and a hangar capable of housing a small ship, along with comprehensive, comfortable accommodations for a crew of seven. Discover a new life among the stars. Only from MISC.

*Warbond version pledges CANNOT be obtained with store credit*
resources.label: Odyssey

resources.name: Odyssey
resources.title: Odyssey
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships. This item is being offered as a limited vehicle concept pledge. This means that the vehicle is currently in development and is not yet accessible as playable content in Star Citizen. If you pledge for this vehicle you will be provided with a loaner vehicle for in-game use until it will be made available in a later patch. The loaner vehicle will be a currently playable vehicle of similar approximate size and/or function to the concept vehicle.
resources.excerpt: Survey distant frontiers and explore the furthest reaches of space with the MISC Odyssey, the most advanced and complete exploration ship available to civilians. Designed to be supremely self-sufficient, the Odyssey comes with an on-board refinery with built-in mining tech, expansive capacity for supplies, and a hangar capable of housing a small ship, along with comprehensive, comfortable accommodations for a crew of seven. Discover a new life among the stars. Only from MISC.
resources.label: Odyssey

resources.name: Redeemer
resources.title: Redeemer
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Now you can own the Next Great Starship. The Aegis Redeemer is a powerful fighting ship capable of dominating combat with an immensely powerful weapons payload. Bristling with turrets and missiles, the Redeemer is effective in almost any conceivable combat scenario.

*Warbond version pledges CANNOT be purchased with store credit*
resources.label: Redeemer

resources.name: Gladius
resources.title: Gladius
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Gladius is an older design which has been updated over the years to keep up with modern technology. In military circles, the Gladius is beloved for its performance and its simplicity. A fast, light fighter with a laser-focus on dogfighting, the Gladius is an ideal interceptor or escort ship.
resources.label: Gladius

resources.name: Mustang Alpha
resources.title: Mustang Alpha
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Inspired by Consolidated Outland CEO Silas Koerner’s cutting edge vision, the Mustang Alpha is a sleek, stylish spacecraft that uses ultralight alloys to push power ratios to the limits, albeit sometimes unsafely. And now, with the optional Cargo Carrier, you can have the Alpha’s advantages without sacrificing carrying capacity.
resources.label: Mustang Alpha

resources.name: Mustang Beta
resources.title: Mustang Beta
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Mustang Beta, with its unprecedented range, is made for long duration flights. The factory standard Tarsus Leaper Jump Engine enables the Beta to travel to the galaxy’s farthest systems with ease, while the ship’s unique Com4T living quarters will make the journey feel like you never left home.
resources.label: Mustang Beta

resources.name: Mustang Gamma
resources.title: Mustang Gamma
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Consolidated Outland’s design and engineering teams have managed to tweak and refine the Mustang into an admirable racer. The end result, the Mustang Gamma, has smooth acceleration, and power on demand thanks to an innovative package featuring three powerful Magma Jet engines for maximum thrust.
resources.label: Mustang Gamma

resources.name: Aurora CL
resources.title: Aurora CL
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Customized for mercantile and trading excursions, the Aurora Clipper is the perfect vessel for aspiring entrepreneurs and seasoned traders alike. Swapping a smaller power plant and armor capabilities for an expanded cargo capacity, the Clipper ups the ante for personal merchant craft.
resources.label: Aurora CL

resources.name: Aurora ES
resources.title: Aurora ES
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Aurora is the modern day descendant of the Roberts Space Industries X-7 spacecraft which tested the very first jump engines. Utilitarian to a T, the Aurora is the perfect beginner's ship: what it lacks in style it makes up for in ample room for upgrade modules.
resources.label: Aurora ES

resources.name: Greycat Industrial ROC-DS
resources.title: Greycat Industrial ROC-DS
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: At Greycat, we understand that mining isn't a one-size-fits-all operation, so we designed the ROC-DS to be as hard-working and versatile as the miners who use it. With more than double the ore capacity of the standard ROC, and a dedicated boom seat for manual laser operation, the ROC-DS makes big jobs manageable. Its the perfect compliment to any mining enterprise, from full-scale digs to fledgling operations. Whatever the task, with Greycat, mining duos now have the right tool to comfortably collect more ore.
resources.label: Greycat Industrial ROC-DS

resources.name: Anvil Hornet
resources.title: Anvil Hornet
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Hornet is the civilian version of the F7A Hornet flown off of the elite Bengal carrier vanguard of the UEE Navy. While not outfitted for long range runs, the Hornet can take her share of hits… and dish out a consistent, powerful response. The Hornet may be uglier than anything from Origin’s lineup, but pilots love them for their rugged reliability.
resources.label: Anvil Hornet

resources.name: MISC Freelancer
resources.title: MISC Freelancer
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: MISC is known for producing efficient, modular, middle-of-the-road ships, primarily transports of different sizes. Freelancers are used as long haul merchant ships by major corporations, but they are just as frequently repurposed as dedicated exploration vessels by independent captains who want to operate on the fringes of the galaxy. Don’t let some of the alien technology in the cockpit surprise you: the Freelancer’s design owes several of its internal systems to a lend-lease deal with the Xi’An.
resources.label: MISC Freelancer

resources.name: Origin 315p Explorer
resources.title: Origin 315p Explorer
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The 315p is ORIGIN’s “exploration” ship, featuring long-range engines and a pre-installed tractor beam! Explore strange new worlds in the comfort of a brand-new ORIGIN 315p.
resources.label: Origin 315p Explorer

resources.name: Origin 325a Fighter
resources.title: Origin 325a Fighter
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The ORIGIN 325a is the militarized model, featuring pre-installed missile launchers and a centerline Mass Driver Cannon. The 325a packs a powerful punch and should scare off even the deadliest Vanduul raiders!
resources.label: Origin 325a Fighter

resources.name: Aegis Dynamics Avenger
resources.title: Aegis Dynamics Avenger
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: An ex-police cruiser spacecraft, the Avenger is a powerful platform for Bounty Hunters to build their fortunes with. Featuring a rugged spaceframe and plenty of customization options, the Avenger is a great choice for someone who doesn't want the flash of the 300 Series.
resources.label: Aegis Dynamics Avenger

resources.name: F7C-S Hornet Ghost
resources.title: F7C-S Hornet Ghost
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Through a combination of low-emission drives, low-draw weapons, and Void Armor technology capable of diffusing scans, the F7C-S Ghost is built for the pilot who wants to keep a low profile. The Ghost is capable of slipping past the most ardent of observers to accomplish whatever goal you need to accomplish. Don’t worry, we won’t ask.
resources.label: F7C-S Hornet Ghost

resources.name: F7C-R Hornet Tracker
resources.title: F7C-R Hornet Tracker
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: If the Ghost is made to hide, the Tracker is made to seek. The F7C-R Tracker boasts an advanced radar suite making it ideal for deep-space explorers who require depth and accuracy in their scan packages. Local militia and larger merc units will also repurpose Trackers to act as mobile C&C ships for their squadrons.
resources.label: F7C-R Hornet Tracker

resources.name: Cutlass Black
resources.title: Cutlass Black
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Avast! Live outside the law with this fearsome fighter, the Drake Interplanetary Cutlass. Become the scourge of the spacelanes as you make your living picking off transports and shipping contraband.
resources.label: Cutlass Black

resources.name: RSI Ursa Rover
resources.title: RSI Ursa Rover
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Built by RSI specifically for the planetside explorer, the Ursa Rover offers civilians military-grade all-terrain capabilities and stands as the rugged standard in ground-based scouting, mapping and discovery applications.
resources.label: RSI Ursa Rover

resources.name: Tumbril Cyclone
resources.title: Tumbril Cyclone
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: With a potent combination of speed, maneuverability, and rugged durability, the Cyclone is a perfect choice for local deliveries and transport between planetside homesteads and outposts.
resources.label: Tumbril Cyclone

resources.name: MISC Prospector
resources.title: MISC Prospector
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Prospector has long been the preferred ship for solo miners and surveyors throughout the universe. Featuring MISC’s sleek design sensibility, a bevy of high-tech mining tools, and dedicated storage pods for extracted resources, this utilitarian powerhouse perfectly balances form and functionality.
resources.label: MISC Prospector

resources.name: Arrow
resources.title: Arrow
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Unmatched design, blazing top speed, and ultra-responsive maneuverability make the Arrow the most agile scrapper in its class. And, a robust weapons package provides firepower to spare. This is truly the classic light fighter updated for the next generation of combat.
resources.label: Arrow

resources.name: Greycat PTV Buggy
resources.title: Greycat PTV Buggy
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Got a massive hangar? The Greycat PTV allows you to get from one end to the other without needing to stop for lunch on the way.
resources.label: Greycat PTV Buggy

resources.name: MISC Freelancer MAX
resources.title: MISC Freelancer MAX
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Freelancer variant with additional cargo capacity at the expense of weapons. The Freelancer MAX variant sacrifices weaponry for an increased cargo capacity making it ideal for equipment or raw materials transport.
resources.label: MISC Freelancer MAX

resources.name: MISC Freelancer DUR
resources.title: MISC Freelancer DUR
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Freelancer DUR variant specializes in exploration. Sacrificing 25% cargo capacity of the standard Freelancer for an enhanced jump drive, a more advanced scanner, and an expanded fuel tank may seem like a bad call to some, but those who value discovery over profit will find it to be their ship of choice.
resources.label: MISC Freelancer DUR

resources.name: Ballista
resources.title: Ballista
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Accommodating ten guided missiles, the Ballista self-propelled air defense system is capable of destruction on a massive scale. Chew through shields, incapacitate or obliterate airborne threats of almost any class foolhardy enough to come within 2000 meters. Whether its pummeling enemies on the frontlines or watching over a strategic post, the Ballista won't just level the playing field, it'll level the competition.
resources.label: Ballista

resources.name: RSI Mantis
resources.title: RSI Mantis
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Stop ships dead in their tracks with RSI’s premier Quantum Enforcement ship. The Mantis features a tailor-made Quantum Enforcement Device from Wei-Tek, capable of ripping ships out of QT with its Quantum Snare and preventing hasty escapes with its Quantum Dampener.
resources.label: RSI Mantis

resources.name: Dragonfly Black
resources.title: Dragonfly Black
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Drake Dragonfly is the perfect snub ship for anyone looking to live on the edge. With nothing separating the pilot from the dangers of space, the Dragonfly is as much an adventure as a ship! Dual-mode conversion allows the Dragonfly to operate on the ground or in space, and a rear-facing second seat means you can even take a passenger! This black model is Drake's standard production version.
resources.label: Dragonfly Black

resources.name: Anvil C8X Pisces Expedition
resources.title: Anvil C8X Pisces Expedition
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Enhancing the standard C8 explorer with added firepower and a limited-edition livery, the C8X Expedition turns a stout snub into a capable stand-alone vessel, ideal for exploring tight spots and unique environments inaccessible to larger ships.
resources.label: Anvil C8X Pisces Expedition

resources.name: Argo Mole
resources.title: Argo Mole
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Work faster and more effectively than ever before with ARGO’s iconic multi-crew miner. Comes with the classic ARGO skin.
resources.label: Argo Mole

resources.name: Cutlass Red
resources.title: Cutlass Red
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Cutlass Red takes Drake’s classic chassis and converts the standard cargo hold into a fully-equipped medical bay, complete with AutoDoc integration, and easy-access via port and starboard entry points. The gun turret is replaced by a Nav-E7 Echo Scanner, equipped with flexible long-range radar and a beacon, with the added nuance of manual manipulation, putting any search and rescue operation into your capable hands.
resources.label: Cutlass Red

resources.name: MISC Reliant Kore (Hauler)
resources.title: MISC Reliant Kore (Hauler)
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The MISC Reliant series is the most accessible way for you and a co-pilot to access the universe and its adventures. The Kore has the most cargo space of the range and is best suited to in-system delivery and local hauling. MISC recently refreshed the whole Reliant range, giving all ships two size-three missile racks. However, the Kore also benefits from an additional twin gimbal mount to bring its offensive abilities closer to the skirmisher of the range, the Tana.
resources.label: MISC Reliant Kore (Hauler)

resources.name: Greycat Industrial ROC
resources.title: Greycat Industrial ROC
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Greycat Industrial Remote Ore Collector (ROC) is a specialized mining vehicle with a rock-solid reputation for ease and ability. Much faster than mining by hand but without the excess power of a mining ship, it’s the ideal way to excavate in-atmosphere and move your enterprise forward.
resources.label: Greycat Industrial ROC

resources.name: 100i
resources.title: 100i
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Tour the universe with the perfect coupling of luxury and performance. The 100i features innovative in-house engineering that makes it among the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long-distance flights that most ships of its size aren’t equipped for, the 100i is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.
resources.label: 100i

resources.name: 125a
resources.title: 125a
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Risks were meant to be taken, but why risk being outgunned when it matters most? The 125a features a rear-mounted missile rack, and innovative in-house engineering that makes it among the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long-distance flights that most ships of its size aren’t equipped for, the 125a is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.
resources.label: 125a

resources.name: 135c
resources.title: 135c
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Get it there fast and look good doing it. The 135c features increased cargo capacity, and innovative in-house engineering that makes it among the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long-distance flights that most ships of its size aren’t equipped for, the 135c is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.
resources.label: 135c

resources.name: Origin Jumpworks 300i
resources.title: Origin Jumpworks 300i
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: If you’re going to travel the stars… why not do it in style? The 300i is Origin Jumpworks’ premiere luxury spacecraft is a sleek, silver killer that sends as much of a message with its silhouette as it does with its particle cannons. Some have accused Origin of putting style over substance and inflating the sticker price to match… but at heart the 300i is still an elegant dogfighter’s tool.
resources.label: Origin Jumpworks 300i

resources.name: Aegis Avenger Titan
resources.title: Aegis Avenger Titan
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Lacking the Prisoner Cells of the Stalker or the EMP Generator of the Warlock, the Titan’s hold is free to carry cargo. Couple that available space with the Avenger’s tried and true combat abilities and you’ve got a light cargo hauler that’s more than capable of handling itself in a fight.
resources.label: Aegis Avenger Titan

resources.name: Nomad
resources.title: Nomad
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: With the versatility of a medium-sized multi-purpose freighter packed into a stylish, compact frame, the Consolidated Outland Nomad is the model of self-sufficiency, the spirit of the open sky, and the perfect solution for anyone yearning to start a brand-new adventure.
resources.label: Nomad

resources.name: RSI Aurora MR
resources.title: RSI Aurora MR
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Aurora is the modern day descendant of the Roberts Space Industries X-7 spacecraft which tested the very first jump engines. Utilitarian to a T, the Aurora is the perfect beginner’s ship: what it lacks in style it makes up for in ample room for upgrade modules. Most pilots move up from an Aurora as quickly as their credit accounts allow… but a select few regard flying this venerable spacecraft as a badge of honor!
resources.label: RSI Aurora MR

resources.name: RSI Aurora LN
resources.title: RSI Aurora LN
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The 2944 “Legionnaire” model of the tried-and-true Aurora spacecraft is here! The Legionnaire is the roughest, toughest Aurora yet, capable of mixing it up with skilled dogfighters or safely carrying a pilot to the edge of the known universe. The most trusted line in spacecraft just got better.
resources.label: RSI Aurora LN

resources.name: Constellation Taurus
resources.title: Constellation Taurus
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Taurus is the dedicated freighter of RSI’s iconic Constellation series, fully configurable but without all the bells and whistles. Perfect for pilots looking to pull out all the stops and streamline their cargo hauling operation, or captains just get acquainted with multicrew vessels.
resources.label: Constellation Taurus

resources.name: Constellation Andromeda
resources.title: Constellation Andromeda
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: When you think handsome bounty hunter making his own way in a galaxy of enemies, you think the Constellation. The Constellation, a multi-person freighter, is the most popular ship in RSI’s current production array. Constellations are beloved by smugglers and merchants alike because they are modular, high powered… and just downright iconic-looking. The Constellation includes a manned turret, a large cargo area and a small flight deck capable of launching a snub fighter in its own defense.
resources.label: Constellation Andromeda

resources.name: Constellation Aquila
resources.title: Constellation Aquila
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Explore any distant horizons! The Constellation Aquila features a redesigned cockpit for maximum visibility, advanced sensors and an onboard Ursa rover for planetary exploration. Let’s see what’s out there!
resources.label: Constellation Aquila

resources.name: Spartan
resources.title: Spartan
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Built on Anvil’s robust Atlas Platform, the same chassis used for their devastating Ballista air defense system, the Spartan takes armored personal transport to the next level. A fully armored hold outfitted with eight comfortable jump seats is the perfect way to get your squad onto any battlefield. The Spartan’s low profile keeps it safe from anti-aircraft weaponry, and a remote gatling turret helps clear the area for easier deployment.
resources.label: Spartan

resources.name: RAFT
resources.title: RAFT
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
As it does with all its industrial concerns, Argo takes cargo transport very seriously, on every scale. The RAFT is no exception, able to carry three standardized 32-SCU cargo containers for a total hauling capacity of 96 SCU. Perfect for entry-level haulers and old pros alike, the RAFT is an ideal solution for reliable local freight transport. Once again, Argo gets the job done.

*Warbond version pledges CANNOT be obtained with store credit*
resources.label: RAFT

resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Now you can own the Next Great Starship. The Aegis Redeemer is a powerful fighting ship capable of dominating combat with an immensely powerful weapons payload. Bristling with turrets and missiles, the Redeemer is effective in almost any conceivable combat scenario.
resources.label: Redeemer
